```
>>> p.x = 7
java.lang.IllegalAccessError: tried to access field ...

```

```
>>> data class MPoint(var x: Int, var y: Int)
>>> val p = MPoint(3, 5)
>>> p
MPoint(x=3, y=5)
>>> p.x = 7
>>> p
MPoint(x=7, y=5)

```

```
>>> val p = MPoint(3, 5)
>>> val q = p
>>> q.x = 7
>>> q
MPoint(x=7, y=5)

```
